notesStmt.note: A translation of the French version of: Luther, Martin. Tessaradecas consolatoria pro laborantibus et oneratis.
Identified as STC 10868 on UMI microfilm.
Imperfect as filmed; too dark as filmed, affecting title page and colophon.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
